full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Acquisition of Flexible Carpets for Dairy Cows

### Reference Number
WS4296532184-Doc4583985882

### Closing Date and Time
June 5, 2024, 2:00 PM (EDT)

### Tender Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada for the acquisition of flexible carpets for dairy cows. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering and installing the new carpets at a location in Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada.

### Selection Criteria
The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by bidders.

### Important Dates
- **Release Date:** May 21, 2024
- **Closing Date and Time:** June 5, 2024, 2:00 PM (EDT)

### Contact Information
For further information or to submit a proposal, please contact Efoe Adjakly at efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Solicitation Document
The full solicitation document, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and any addenda, can be downloaded from the Ariba Discovery website:
```
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19772149?extsite=MTk3NzIxNDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
```

### Related Information
- **Spanish**: If you would like to receive this solicitation document in Spanish, please contact the contracting authority.
- **Annex Statement of Requirement:** This annex is included in the solicitation document.

### Languages of Communication
English and French are both official languages of Canada, and tenderers must be able to communicate in both languages. English is the first language, and French may be requested. ''
